title: Emilia Pires appointed by the Secretary-General of United Nations Ban Ki-moon to High-level Panel of Eminent Persons on the post 2015 Development Agenda «  Government of Timor-Leste

quotes: From 24 Nov until 29 Nov Programme in Tasi Tolu as part of the Celebrations marking the 50th anniversary of the Unilateral Proclamation of Independence of the Democratic Republic of Timor-Leste
25 of November of 2025 New Era of Cooperation Dawns for Greater Sunrise
22 of November of 2025 Extraordinary Meeting of the Council of Ministers on November 22nd, 2025
11 of November of 2025 Message on the occasion of the 34th Anniversary of the Santa Cruz Massacre and the 20th Anniversary of National Youth Day
Díli, July 31, 2012 Emilia Pires appointed by the Secretary-General of United Nations Ban Ki-moon to High-level Panel of Eminent Persons on the post 2015 Development Agenda
Today the Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon announced the 26-member panel due to hold it’s first meeting in September.

With the target date for the Millennium Development Goals approaching in 2015, Ms. Pires will be contributing to shaping the post MDG agenda with “the fight against poverty and sustainable development at its core.”
